input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Pre-Lit Carolina Pine Garland"
Reference Product Description:
This Carolina Pine garland features mixed bristle and cashmere branch tips and is trimmed with pine cones. It is pre-strung with 100 warm white battery operated LED lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This indoor, outdoor garland can be displayed over doors, windows, fireplace mantels, fence or stairway railings.

Designed with a Norwood Fir branch base, this pre-lit artificial Christmas garland is 9 feet long and decorated with pine cones.
Features 100 warm white battery operated LED lights that remain lit even when a bulb goes out. The lights are strung on before packaging, offering an easier, more convenient set up.
Suitable as an indoor or outdoor Christmas decoration, drape this garland over any door, window or entryway to add a festive feel to any area of the house.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials and hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this garland is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories donâ€™t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='National Tree Company Norwood Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='National Tree Company Norwood Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='Worth Imports 51" Mistletoe Garland'
  - Name='Sullivans Artificial Alpine Fir Garland'
  - Name='Glitzhome 9' Pre-Lit Snow Flocked Greenery Pine Poinsettia Christmas Garland with 50 Warm'
  - Name='National Tree Company Noelle 6' Garland with Battery-Operated Soft White LED Lights'
  - Name='Nearly Natural 6' Artificial Christmas Garland with 50 Warm White Lights'
  - Name='Ornativity Pine and Berries Garland'
  - Name='Northlight 5' x 4.75" Pine Springs, Berries and Pine Cones Artificial Christmas Garland'
  - Name='National Tree Company Christmas Joy Artificial Christmas Garland'
  - Name='Northlight Colorado Spruce Artificial Christmas Garland'
  - Name='National Tree Company Wintry Berry Garland'
  - Name='Pine Artificial Christmas Tree set with Wreath & Garland and LED Light Alcott Hill'
  - Name='Mercury Row Flocked Long Needle Pine Pre-Lit Christmas Tree'
  - Name='BrylaneHome Pre-Lit Arrow-Tip 9' Garland'
  - Name='Kurt Adler 24-Foot Pre-Lit Green Pathway Garland with Stakes'
  - Name='Winston Porter Prelit Holiday Christmas 4-Piece Set'
  - Name='Queens of Christmas Garland'
  - Name='Coen Norfolk Pine Christmas Garland'
  - Name='Northlight Frosted Pine Christmas Garland with Blueberries, Bows, and Ornaments'
  - Name='Sullivans Berry and Pinecones Garland'
  - Name='Galarza Lighted Pine Christmas Tree Andover Mills'
  - Name='Northlight Real Touch Flocked Calloway Fir with Berries Artificial Christmas Garland'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Worth Imports 51" Mistletoe Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Completely different type of greenery (mistletoe vs pine fir), likely different silhouette and use, no light mention.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Sullivans Artificial Alpine Fir Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar type of fir garland but no mention of lights or decorations; possibly different silhouette.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Glitzhome 9' Pre-Lit Snow Flocked Greenery Pine Poinsettia Christmas Garland with 50 Warm
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same length and pre-lit with warm lights, but features different decorations (poinsettia) and snow flocking, fewer lights.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Noelle 6' Garland with Battery-Operated Soft White LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and pre-lit with battery lights, but shorter length and different product line, unclear branch type.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural 6' Artificial Christmas Garland with 50 Warm White Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit artificial garland with warm lights but shorter length and different brand; no branch type indicated.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Ornativity Pine and Berries Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pine garland with added berries decoration, possibly similar silhouette but no light mention.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 5' x 4.75" Pine Springs, Berries and Pine Cones Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pine garland with pine cones and berries but shorter and no light indication; similar decoration style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Christmas Joy Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand Christmas garland, but unclear if pre-lit or type of greenery; likely similar quality and use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight Colorado Spruce Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different fir variety (spruce) but similar function and construction; no light or decoration info.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Wintry Berry Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand but berries decoration only, no mention of pine cones or lighting.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pine Artificial Christmas Tree set with Wreath & Garland and LED Light Alcott Hill
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Set includes garland and LED lights, but different brand and includes tree/wreath; likely different construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Mercury Row Flocked Long Needle Pine Pre-Lit Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit pine tree, not a garland; related product category but different product type and silhouette.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: BrylaneHome Pre-Lit Arrow-Tip 9' Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same length and pre-lit garland with battery lights; probably similar silhouette though different brand and branch style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Kurt Adler 24-Foot Pre-Lit Green Pathway Garland with Stakes
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit long garland for pathways, same function and lighting feature but different usage and much longer length.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Winston Porter Prelit Holiday Christmas 4-Piece Set
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Holiday set involving multiple pieces, likely including garland but less focused on single garland product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Queens of Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Garland product but no details on length, lighting, or decoration; moderate relevance.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Coen Norfolk Pine Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar pine garland with specific pine type; no mention of lighting but likely similar construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight Frosted Pine Christmas Garland with Blueberries, Bows, and Ornaments
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pine garland with heavy decorative accents; no light mention and shorter length likely.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Sullivans Berry and Pinecones Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Garland featuring pinecones and berries, but no LED or branch type specified.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Galarza Lighted Pine Christmas Tree Andover Mills
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Lighted pine Christmas tree, not a garland; different product type with different silhouette and use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight Real Touch Flocked Calloway Fir with Berries Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar fir garland type with berries added; no light mention but realistic touch mimics quality.
